notes.text: Trunade was the shot in the arm CA needed; in a very good place in this meta. Everyone knows the deck by now so won't labor, but found this build to be the most well rounded. Good on first turn with Saffira and on T2 with OTKs. Don't like the giving the extra resource with Standby especially as the eternal Kuriboh starts to emerge back in the meta. Deck seldomly bricked even with two trunades in balance and led to a turn 2  OTK with Trunade close to 50% of the time when going 2nd. Highly recommend, also would like to test Bacon in lieu of one Petit, more D for the few times you do brick.
